As a parent to two under two I rarely ever eat out because I know how hard it is to ask a small child to sit still. They are too small to understand you need to sit here- by human nature they are curious and want to run around. So we for the most part stay home or go to child friendly places- we don't eat junk so no chucke cheese or McDonald's- but we have a bag of toys, iPad, coloring and snacks if food is taking long. I agree with some comments that how do you know if a child has a disability? Should we not be a tolerable society? Just because we are parents doesn't mean we shouldn't be allowed to go out in to the public- restaurants, cafe or etc. I find it sad that so many people are quick to be hateful. I know I try my best as a parent when out in public but they are children at the end of the day- they won't sit and be quiet. I think many of you forgot that you were all children once not animals to be locked away somewhere until adulthood hit.

There is a leftist movement that 80% + of our, so-called politicians and representatives are a part of and it started a long, long time ago. The whole Al Gore """"Global Warming-Climate Change"""" deal is nothing but fabrication from start to finish, but unfortuantely for those behind the lie, many are waking up to it. Global Warming is a money maker... from those who release toxic chemicals into our air on a daily basis (chem-trails) to those making solar panels and electric vehicles today, in fact, the """"green movement"""" , it's all a big sham being played on the American people. People, like Boxer, get defensive when the Global Warming topic is questioned, because they have a stake in the game, money has been tucked in their pockets and they don't want lose a dime of it because facts are being brought out.
And to you - the people that watch this crap. Shame on you also !
It happened only 50 years ago in the south, and still happening 80 years ago all over our country
